EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation for API-First Development Workshop at SpringOne Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there,}}
Thank you for your RSVP to the API-First Development workshop with Apigee and Pivotal Cloud Foundry! This is a no-cost event for registered SpringOne Platform attendees. Below you will find additional event details:
Date: Monday, August 1st {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date!}} Time: 9:00am - 12:00pm PT Location: Aria Hotel <[[https://springoneplatform.io/travel]]> Room: Bristlecone 6 [Level 1]
Important course pre-requisites and more details can be found on the Workshop website <[[http://info.pivotal.io/hN0k80U00I0000CTA020JH0]]>.
In this course, you will:
- Build an API Proxy in Apigee Edge on top of a Pivotal Cloud Foundry app - Add security and monitoring to an API - Learn how to use Apigee Edge Analytics - Learn about OpenAPI - Use Pivotal Route Services to apply API management to a service running in Cloud Foundry - Learn ways to document and provide self-service access to APIs
Questions? Contact us via email <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there!
